vamshin
vamshin

replies.bodyText:
Thanks for enriching the stats. Few other stats which might be helpful as well
* graph_memory_usage_percentage in terms of total cache capacity at node level

* index_graph_memory_usage_percentage at index level for that node in terms of total cache capacity

* index_graph_loads at index level which counts the number of graph loads for an index in that node. This helps in identifying the hot indices in the cache. We could add a counter variable in the KNNIndexCacheEntry and increment it when ever the entry is accessed.


I think the first two make sense. I am not sure on the last one. Isn't the number of graphs per index somewhat analogous to index_graph_loads?
replies.author: jmazanec15

replies.bodyText: Ah right. Third one seem to be already covered. You could ignore the third one.
replies.author: vamshin

timeline.message: Add graph memory usage as a percentage
